backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining game state, dialogue, activities, moments, and save data with functions to start or continue a game.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented gameplay features, linked files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend source files for reference during build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide outlining steps to diagnose and retry failed Internet Computer deployments.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and light/dark mode palettes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the root element and loading the React application.
frontend/OPS_CANISTER_AVAILABILITY.md: Operational guide explaining canister availability, uptime limitations, and how to keep the backend running.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing screens, startup flow, backend availability, and game launch logic with diagnostics.
frontend/src/config/adminGate.ts: Config file defining the local admin username and the derived storage key for admin gate state.
Defines the Activity interface and a list of preset activities with trust effects and optional moment unlocks.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudio.ts: Provides a Zustand-based audio manager for volume, mute state, and looping background music playback.
frontend/src/game/characters/Puro.tsx: Three.js Puro character model with idle animation, hover effects, and click-to-open dialogue behavior.
frontend/src/game/controls/MobileControl: Mobile-only control overlay implementing touch joystick movement, look controls, and jump button.
frontend/src/game/controls/usePlayerCont: Combines keyboard and mobile input into unified movement/look state and handles jump events.
Zustand store tracking joystick, look deltas, and one-shot jump requests with reset helpers.
frontend/src/game/customization/customiz: Defines customization item metadata, including descriptions and allowed placement locations.
Contains dialogue nodes and choices forming a branching dialogue tree with trust effects and requirements.
frontend/src/game/GameView.tsx: Top-level game container managing initialization, canvas rendering, UI overlays, scene switching, and pause handling.
frontend/src/game/letters/letterTemplate: Defines preset friendly, curious, and encouraging response lists and a function that selects one based on keywords in a letter.
frontend/src/game/minigames/BookSortingM: Implements a drag-and-drop-style book sorting minigame that adjusts trust and signals completion when all books are placed correctly.
frontend/src/game/minigames/DrawingMiniG: Displays a gallery of Puro’s drawings, tracking viewed items and adjusting trust as the player browses.
frontend/src/game/minigames/HideAndSeekM: Runs a timed hide‑and‑seek minigame where the player guesses Puro’s location, affecting trust based on speed and accuracy.
frontend/src/game/minigames/MiniGameLaun: Provides a menu to launch individual minigames and handles transitions and closing behavior.
frontend/src/game/moments/MomentPlayer.t: Renders a cinematic moment with a title, scene text, and close control.
frontend/src/game/moments/momentsData.ts: Exports moment definitions containing text scenes and trust requirements.
frontend/src/game/scene/HiveScene.tsx: Defines a 3D hive environment with player movement, jumping physics, camera control, and procedural tree placement.
frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx: Controls player movement, jumping, camera following, and proximity-based teleport triggers in the 3D library scene.
frontend/src/game/state/useGameStore.ts: Defines the game's global Zustand store with UI flags, progression data, scene state, and actions for updating trust, activities, letters, and navigation.
frontend/src/game/story/endings.ts: Contains ending definitions with trust thresholds and a helper to select the correct ending for a given trust level.
frontend/src/game/story/EndingScene.tsx: Displays the final ending based on trust level, unlocks it, and provides options to start a new game or return to the title screen.
frontend/src/game/ui/ActivityMenu.tsx: Renders selectable activities that modify trust, mark activities complete, unlock moments, and close the menu.
Lets players place discovered customization items in the library and shows both placed and available items.
frontend/src/game/ui/DialoguePanel.tsx: Manages dialogue nodes, applies trust effects from choices, filters choice availability, and handles closing dialogue.
frontend/src/game/ui/LettersPanel.tsx: UI panel for writing letters, sending them, and viewing generated responses using game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/MomentsMenu.tsx: Displays unlockable story moments and allows playing them if unlocked.
frontend/src/game/ui/PauseMenu.tsx: Pause menu offering resume, quick navigation, settings, resets, and admin terminal access.
frontend/src/game/ui/SettingsScreen.tsx: Audio settings screen allowing mute toggling and volume adjustment.
frontend/src/game/ui/TrustMeter.tsx: Shows current trust level with color-coded label and progress bar.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated or anonymous backend actors, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAvailabilit: Checks backend health status using the actor and provides availability info with refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for backend game actions and state, each calling actor methods and refreshing the gameState query.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base imports and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes with a warm color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/startup.ts: Manages one‑time app initialization including asset preloading, storage checks, and startup state tracking.
frontend/src/state/useAdminGateStore.ts: Zustand store implementing a local-only admin unlock gate with persistent unlocked state.
Empty placeholder file for a Zustand store related to server access.
frontend/src/ui/AdminAccessPanel.tsx: UI panel for unlocking or locking admin mode using the admin gate store with basic feedback messages.
frontend/src/ui/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays a styled credits screen with game info, external link attribution, and a back button.
frontend/src/ui/DiagnosticTerminalOverla: Admin-only diagnostic terminal overlay with command execution, keyboard shortcuts, scrolling output, and input handling.
frontend/src/ui/GameLaunchErrorScreen.ts: Displays a user-friendly launch error screen with retry/back navigation and optional technical details based on diagnostics state.
frontend/src/ui/GameRuntimeErrorBoundary: Catches runtime rendering errors in the game and shows a fallback UI with optional stack details and a button to return to title.
frontend/src/ui/ServerStatusIndicator.ts: Shows a small status badge indicating backend health as online, offline, or checking.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/commands.ts: Implements a restricted terminal command handler supporting help, clear, diagnostics, and server status queries.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalDiag: Formats diagnostic data into printable terminal lines.
frontend/src/ui/terminal/useTerminalStor: Zustand store managing terminal visibility, input/output history, and state updates.
frontend/src/ui/TitleScreen.tsx: Renders the game's title menu with game start options, server status indicators, offline notices, and admin controls.
frontend/src/utils/launchErrorNormalizat: Normalizes raw backend launch errors into user-friendly summaries with categorized error types.
frontend/STARTUP.md: Documentation describing the app startup flow, initialization tasks, and how to extend the startup process.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing a 3D game where touching Puro teleports the player to a generated white latex forest, along with features and pending requests.
